dietHistory: The American Heart Association, World Cancer Research Fund, and American Institute for Cancer Research recommend a diet that consists mostly of unprocessed plant foods, with emphasis on a wide range of whole grains, legumes, and non-starchy vegetables and fruits.
eatMotto: ,,Just as a large country usually means a fairly average level of public education, such a large kitchen usually means quite meager food.’’
ecoCommunicate: We can all easily imagine what well-being is. It is a life in good conditions, possibly without stress. This is obviously a very oversimplification, but it contains the gist of the term. In breeding, it is also important that the food is as close to the natural as possible and that the animals are treated well, which every breeder should look after and not only use.
workMotto: ,,I never remember feeling tired by work, though idleness exhausts me completely.’’
